main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects occurred on 18 August 1950 in Sioux Falls, South Dakota.
interesting points: The objects displayed brilliant orange or white or red lights with no noise or trail,The observers noted a rapid disappearance of the lights within 3 seconds,Movement of the objects was estimated at 5-10 seconds per observation period,The sighting was longer than typical aircraft observations at the time,The report indicated insufficient data for evaluation, and the object could not be classified.
sighted object: brilliant orange or white or red lights
